title: Personal Portfolio Website
content: Built a responsive personal portfolio website using React for the frontend and Node.js with Express for the backend. Implemented a contact form with email integration using Nodemailer. Created a MongoDB database to store project information and blog posts. Designed and developed a custom CMS interface for easy content updates. Deployed the application on Heroku with automated CI/CD pipeline. Achieved 95+ PageSpeed score through image optimization and code splitting. Integrated Google Analytics to track visitor engagement and page performance.
